item.title: ABOUT ME
item.description:
Hi, Iâ€™m Daniel,

a passionate homelab enthusiast and Software-Defined Networking engineer based in Germany. With a strong focus on VMware technologies, I enjoy exploring the boundaries of virtualization and building innovative solutions in my home lab. This blog is my space to share insights, tips, and projects from my journey in the world of software-defined infrastructure.
